package.name: Auth_RADIUS
package.summary: Wrapper Classes for the RADIUS PECL.
package.description: This package provides wrapper-classes for the RADIUS PECL. There are different Classes for the different authentication methods. If you are using CHAP-MD5 or MS-CHAP you need also the Crypt_CHAP package. If you are using MS-CHAP you need also the mhash extension.

release.notes: * Added support for LAN-Manager-Responses * BugFix: The RADIUS_USER_NAME was sent twice * Send also the RADIUS_NAS_PORT_TYPE
